response.overview: The film was shot half a year after the Wenchuan earthquake, showing the post-disaster reconstruction of several ordinary people and families in Hongbai Town, Shifang City, the hardest-hit area and the surrounding area. One of the main figures is the 62-year-old Lin Lifeng, the host of a local Taoist temple. Because Taoism has various methods of directly intervening in real life in its methodology, such as watching feng shui, resolving evils and causing misfortunes, etc., the local victims brought various problems in their post-disaster life and mental state and asked Lin for help. After suffering a sudden severe damage to human existence, the need for faith and divine power.
